"While polio exists anywhere. It's a threat everywhere."

'Polio's Last Mile' invites you on an emotional journey to Zambia to feel the heartbeat of hope, resilience, and unwavering determination of the heroes on the front lines to end polio once and for all.

Through a combination of 360 video, interviews, archival footage, ambisonic sound, and data visualization, you'll be inspired by the people, places, and innovations that have driven the 99.9% decrease in polio.
